description: This database contains the embedded vectors and some other related attributes for the `financial_report` database.

collection.description: This table stores the embedded vector of the `text_content` column for each row in the `financial_report.chunks` table.

fields.description: A unique identifier for each vector.
The embedded vector of the `financial_report.chunks.text_content` column.
The row ID in the original `financial_report.chunks` table.
